altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวราชามังกร

description.en:
A once in a lifetime opportunity comes to Lucina, the illegitimate daughter of Lord Berek. Hakkan, the great conqueror who rules the dragon lands of Tayer, gives Lucina the opportunity to be his kidnapped bride. Desperate for any kind of freedom, Lucina agrees and steps into the unknown world.

---

**Note:** The novel originally serialized as R15, once its web serialization was completed, it released as R19 as an ebook (volumes). The webtoon will follow how it originally released, which is R15.
description.es: Diez años atrás, una niña le salvó la vida a un dragón. No imaginaban que las vueltas del destino los unirían nuevamente cuando la propiedad familiar de Lucina resulta invadida por la temible nación Tayar, liderada por el rey Hakan. Después de que la egoísta madrastra de Lucina la ofreciera en matrimonio a Hakan a cambio de sus vidas, Lucina se da cuenta de que está destinada a viajar al árido reino de Tayar y casarse con su rey que parece ser brutal. ¿Qué tendrá guardado el destino para esta extraña pareja? ¿Catástrofe o romance?
description.fr: Lucina, enfant illégitime du baron Berg, mène une vie misérable, entourée de sa famille et des servants qui la maltraitent. Elle parvient à gagner sa liberté à ses vingt ans par une étrange occasion, le roi des barbares, l'enlève pour qu'elle devienne sa femme.
description.id: Lucina, anak gelap dari Kerajaan Brion yang memiliki kekuatan penyembuhan bertemu dengan Hakkan, seekor naga dari Suku Tayar, yang sekarat. Siapa sangka, mereka bertemu lagi saat sang naga berniat untuk membantai masyarakat Brion. Tapi saat ingin melakukan pembantaian, Hakkan justru menikahi Lucina! Apa yang akan terjadi setelah pernikahan itu?
description.ko:
베르크 남작가의 사생아 루시나에게 일생일대의 기회가 찾아온다. 드래곤의 땅 타야르를 통치하는 대왕이자 정복자 하칸.
그의 약탈 신부가 되는 조건으로 주어진 또 다른 삶의 기회.
비록 반쪽짜리 자유라도 절실했던 루시나는 그렇게 미지의 세계로 발을 내딛게 되는데… 절망의 끝을 밝혀 준 단 하나의 사랑 이야기.
description.th: ชีวิตของลูซีน่า บุตรสาวนอกสมรสของบารอนเบล์ก ได้เปลี่ยนไปชั่วพริบตา ในวันที่เธอกำลังจะถูกขายให้เป็นนางสนมของราชาแก่ก็มีเหตุวุ่นวายบางอย่างเกิดขึ้น จับพลัดจับผลูให้เธอกลายเป็นเจ้าสาวของฮาคาน ผู้ปกครองที่ยิ่งใหญ่และน่าเกรงขามของเผ่ามังกรธายาร์ และเป็นคน (?) ที่เธอเคยช่วยชีวิตไว้เมื่อ 10 ปีก่อนอีกด้วย
description.zh:
被献祭给龙之王的少女，
从强取豪夺到互相救赎！
贝尔格男爵家的私生女露西娜迎来了她一生绝无仅有的机会，那就是成为哈坎的掠夺新娘，一个统治龙之地—塔亚尔的大王兼征服者。迫切渴望自由的露西娜就这样踏上了未知的世界，开启了全新的生活………
description.zh-hk: 貝勒克男爵的私生女露西娜在家族中受盡侮辱、成年後還被賣給老國王當妾室，絕望之時機會卻降臨了！統治著塔雅爾龍族的王兼征服者夏坎，以成為他的新娘為代價，換取免死及重生的機會，否則就與家族同歸於盡！面對未知的命運也想迫切逃離家族的露西娜會如何抉擇呢？一場照亮絕望盡頭的愛情故事......

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.vi: Tổ đội anh hùng đã đánh bại được quỷ vương và kết thúc cuộc hành trình của họ. Nhưng thế chưa phải là hết, cuộc đời của cô nàng pháp sư Elf này sẽ còn rất dài, hơn cả những người đồng đội cũ của cô, một cuộc phiêu lưu mới để cô trải qua nhiều cung bậc cảm xúc, cũng như là học hỏi thêm về con người.
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第6部 ストーンオーシャン カラー版

description.en: The highly acclaimed sixth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Italy to America, as Jolyne Cujoh—daughter of Jotaro Kujo—is sentenced to 15 years in prison for a murder she didn’t commit! In a bizarre turn of events, the prison is filled with Stand users. Some become her allies, but many are sent to kill Jolyne and her friends in a scheme to resurrect the scourge of the Joestar family—DIO! It’s a battle for survival in a prison where death lurks around every corner while Jolyne fights to save her father’s life in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 6—Stone Ocean!
description.it: La storia della figlia di Jotaro Kujo, Jolyne Cujoh. È stata accusata di un omicidio e finisce nella prigione di Green Dolphin Street. Suo padre gli ha dato un amuleto, con cui si ferisce la mano e sblocca la sua abilità stand, Stone Free, che permette di trasformare il suo corpo in una stringa comandabile. La stringa può creare uno stand umanoide che arriva fino a 2 metri dal suo corpo, e può estenderlo come il filo. Nella prigione trova preso degli alleati portatori di Stand come Hermes (Kiss) e Foo Fighters.
description.kk: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken (ДжоДжоның шытырман хикаясы) сериясының алтыншы оқиғалы доғасы.Джотаро Куджоның қызы Джолин Куджоның оқиғасы. Ол кісі өлтіргені үшін сотталып, Green Dolphin Street түрмесінде қалады. Оған әкесінен қалған тұмар беріледі, ол оның қолын кесіп, оның денесін тірі жіпке айналдыруға мүмкіндік беретін Stone Free қабілетін ашады. Жіп оның денесінен 2 метр қашықтықта гуманоидтық тірек жасай алады және одан әрі жіп ретінде созылуы мүмкін. Түрмеде ол көп ұзамай сотталған әріптестерімен және Эрмес (Kiss) және Foo Fighters стендінің пайдаланушыларымен одақтас болады.
description.es-la: La historia de la hija de Jotaro Kujo (Parte 3), Jolyne Kujo. La acusan de un asesinato y termina en la prisión de Green Dolphin Street. Le dan un amuleto heredado de su padre, que le hace un corte en la mano y hace aparecer su stand, Stone Free, que le permite desenredar su cuerpo en una cuerda a su control. La cuerda puede tener una forma humanoide en el rango de 2 metros desde su cuerpo, y puede extenderse más como una cuerda. En la prisión, pronto se vuelve aliada con sus compañeros convictos y usuarios de Stand, Hermes (Kiss) y Foo Fighters (Goo Goo Dolls).

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

altTitles.ja: おやすみ ふみさん

description.en: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets "Fumi-san," rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly... Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? "I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun...?" Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters.
description.ja: 春。田舎から上京し、都心の大学に入学した凛太は、入部した文芸部で学園一の美女と噂される"ふみさん"に出会う。そして、共に参加した飲み会帰りに彼女を送ることになったのだが…。無事家まで送り届け、ひとり帰ろうとしたその矢先！ 豹変したふみさんに強引にベッドに誘われてーー！？「凛太くんが良い人でいられるのは、いつまでかな…？」ふみさんに理性崩壊まで試される。

description.en: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

description.en:
Toru Aikawa, a college student who spends his days immersing himself in games because his daily life is so boring, was standing alone in a forest in a different world before he even could realize why. Moreover, it seems that he has reincarnated into the "Neta character" he made in a game. The Genderswap reincarnation of the strongest heroine packed with overflowing Chuunibyo and ideals!

The strongest genderswap reincarnation fantasy begins here !!

---

**Note:** A Neta character is a character whose action has captured the hearts of viewers and players and has been turned into a important part of the story.
description.id:
Toru Aikawa, seorang mahasiswa yang menghabiskan hari-harinya dalam permainan karena kesehariannya yang membosankan. ketika dia menyadarinya, dia sedang berdiri sendirian di hutan di dunia yang berbeda karena suatu alasan.. Selain itu, sepertinya dia telah bereinkarnasi ke dalam "karakter baru" yang dibuat dari bermain game….

bereinkarnasi menjadi yang terkuat yang dengan Chuunibyo yang meluap-luap dan juga cita-citanya!
description.pt-br:
Toru Aikawa, um estudante universitário que passa seus dias mergulhando em jogos porque sua vida diária é tão chata, estava sozinho em uma floresta em um mundo diferente antes que ele pudesse perceber o porquê. Além disso, parece que ele reencarnou no "personagem Neta" que ele fez em um jogo. A reencarnação Genderswap(troca de gênero) da heroína mais forte repleta de Chuunibyo transbordante e ideais!

A fantasia de reencarnação de troca de gênero mais forte começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: あなた達それでも先生ですかっ！

description.en: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!?
description.ja: 親が経営する旅館にある日、居候としてやってきたのは学校の先生たち!? 男子高校生・風見ヒロは旅館のため、自分の未来のためにお世話をすることに!?
description.pl: Pewnego dnia nauczyciele przychodzą jako freeloaderzy do zajazdu prowadzonego przez jego rodziców!? Kazami Hiro, uczeń szkoły średniej, postanawia zadbać o zajazd i swoją przyszłość!? Pod jednym dachem rozpoczyna się zakazana haremowa komedia romantyczna!!

altTitles.ja: ひとり暮らしのOLを描きました

altTitles.en: I Drew An OL Who Lives Alone

description.en:
The life of a Japanese salaryman or OL (office lady) can be a thoroughly depressing one. Waking up early, working all day, staying out late for (mandatory) drinks with clients and coworkers, and then catching a few hours of sleep if you’re lucky, only to repeat it again and again and again.

This is the story of a "Single OL" and her pitiful lifestyle.
___
**Note:** Volume 5 is set as the final volume because Volume 6 contains entirely extra episodes.

altTitles.es: El matón y la cuatro ojos

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー君とメガネちゃん

description.en:
The story starts with a seemingly unassuming class rep Adachi Hana who has taken an interest in the school's known delinquent, Shinagawa Daichi. Just what is her reason for following Daichi and wanting him to go on the class field trip?  


---
description.ru:
Дайчи Шинагава всегда хорошо дрался и себя в обиду не давал. Но на родине самураев на любого, кто хорошо умеет что-то делать: печь окамияки, играть на гармошке или драться – всегда найдется тот, кто бросит вызов его мастерству. Именно это и приключилось с Шинагавой, чем больше он дрался, и чем лучше у него это получалось, тем больше забияк стекалось к нему со всей округи. Все хотели побить его, чтобы получить сопутствующий «титул».Со временем Шинагава стал известным даже среди обычных школьников, те его стали сторониться и бояться, повесив клеймо «янки». Так в Японии называют хулиганов, любящих махать кулаками и вечно приходящих в школу с синяком под глазом.И все бы было ничего, если бы Шинагава не хотел в глубине души стать нормальным парнем, окончить школу и унаследовать отцовскую небольшую клинику. И вот, когда он поступил в новую школу, чтобы начать все сначала, но… ничего не изменилось: у ворот его снова ждали любители получать по морде, а одноклассники опять обходили стороной.Правда, было и кое-что новое, а именно – в его классе появилась на редкость позитивная ученица с необычайно развитым чувством доброжелательности. Она-то и взялась за беднягу Шинагаву, всячески пытаясь сделать из него человека.  
  
Note: The epilogue chapter was released six years after the manga had ended

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: みーちゃんとアイリ

description.en: Midori, a corporate slave, is being worked to death day and night. Her meals come from the convenience store, her refuge is alcohol and cigarettes, and she goes home only to sleep - such are the utterly wasteful days she leads. On her way home one day, she discovers a girl sleeping in the dumpster. She helps the girl on a whim, who introduces her self as Airi, a **witch**(!) with mysterious powers. Airi begs her, "Please let me stay with you for a while", and so begins their strange cohabitation life!? Warm and fluffy relief has arrived to Midori's weary days. These two mismatched ladies, a corporate slave office worker and a mess of a witch, begin their cohabitation life! (Translated from BookWalker)

title.en: Undark - Atarashii Toumei na Chikara no Subete

altTitles.ja: アンダーク 新しい透明な力のすべて
アンダーク

altTitles.en: Undark: All About the New Invisible Power

description.en: Maria and Anzu are two sisters living alone with no relatives. The explosion of a dark supernova changes their destiny...!

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

title.en: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる

altTitles.en: The Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Speaks in a Heavy Dialect and It's Too Much of a Pain

altTitles.ru: Девушка, в которую я влюбился на Окинаве, говорит на очень трудном диалекте, и с ней сложно общаться

altTitles.en: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying

altTitles.vi: Cô gái tôi yêu ở Okinanawa nói tiếng địa phương, mà tôi chẳng hiểu gì hết

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.
description.pt-br: Eu, Nakamura Teruaki, me transferi para Okinawa e estou apaixonado pela Kyan, mas não entendo seu dialeto. Higa está sempre me ajudando interpretando o dialeto... Um romance intercultural um pouco incomum em uma ilha tropical está prestes a começar!

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

altTitles.ja: 正体不明と恐怖

description.en: Kaname Isurugi, who suffered facial injuries in an accident, has a hard time getting along with the people at his school ever since he entered. When school counselor Sugata asks Kaname to help solve the problems of the girls in his charge, Kaname half-heartedly makes contact with four of them. After a month passes without any response, Kaname begins to question his actions. Suddenly, Kaname has a shocking "fateful encounter".
description.ja: 事故が原因で顔に傷が残り、周りから距離をとられてしまっている高校生、石動かなめ。ある日、スクールカウンセラーの須賀田鳥子に半ば言いくるめられるように、彼女の仕事を手伝わされることになってしまう。４人の女子生徒と交流することになりこれまでと違った日々を送るかなめの背中に、突然、カッターナイフを突きつけられる。訳も解らず拘束されるかなめに対し、仮面の少女は驚きの告白をして――。

altTitles.fr: La vilaine vit encore une fois

altTitles.ja: 悪女は2度生きる
悪女は２度生きる

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่สองของนางร้าย
ชีวิตครั้งใหม่ ของยัยตัวร้าย

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**

description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.uk:
З дитинства щастя Артезії залежало від успіху її брата. Як майстерна маніпуляторка і інтриганка, вона стала його найціннішим союзником у захопленні трону імперії. Саме тому зрада її брата остаточно її зламала, коли Артезія була ув'язнена у покарання за всі свої злочини.
Невдовзі після того, як її врятував великий герцог Седрік Еброн, вона клянеться допомогти йому повалити жорстокого нового імператора, пожертвувавши своїм життям за допомогою забороненої магії.
Тепер, прокинувшись на кілька років назад у минуле, вона покине власну родину, щоб будь якою ціною допомогти Седріку. Кажуть, що кров - не вода, але чи зможе Артезія знищити свого брата, поки її власний роман розквітає серед цього хаосу?
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

---

À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric. title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

altTitles.vi: Psycho X Past: Những Vụ Án Giết Người Kỳ Quái

description.en: Godai, a policeman, who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?
description.ja: 犯人への過剰暴力が原因で左遷させられた熱血刑事の五代。新たな上司は自称“超能力捜査官”の飛高警視正。赴任早々、五代はとある連続殺人事件へと潜入捜査を命じられるのだが…!?

description.en:
Consumed by the flames of a burning castle, an aged butler is reincarnated as the younger version of his incompetent master, Duke Aaron of Brahn. 

Suddenly finding himself in a position of real power, equipped with his past expertise in estate management, the “new” duke sets out to rule Brahn the “right” way. Will the young Duke Aaron be able to save Brahn and its people from destruction at the hands of his uncle, the evil Emperor Zeron? 

How will he balance being an effective leader with the ruthlessness required to survive? Only time will tell!
description.ko:
위대한 황제 글라인의 아들이자
'드래곤의 가호'를 받은 황태자 '아론'.
하지만 숙부인 '제론'의 반란으로
제국의 변방 '브란 영지'로 쫓겨나게 된다.
​
"제론 황제가 우릴 다 죽일 거야..."
​
복수도, 황위도 잊으라는 아버지의 유언을 지키며
척박한 영지의 공작으로 무력하게 살아가던 어느 날,
제론 황제는 브란 영지를 침공한다!
그가 원하는 건 아론의 목숨뿐만이 아니었다.
​
브란 영지의 소멸!
​
제론 황제가 퍼붓는 화염 속으로 사라져 버리는
아론 공작과 브란 영지를 지켜보던 충신 ‘가일’도
결국 재가 되어 사라졌다.
​
아니, 그런 줄 알았다!
​
다시 눈을 떴을 때,
젊은 날의 아론 공작이 된 자신을 발견한 가일!
​
"공작님처럼 힘을 숨기며 살진 않겠어!"
​
수단과 방법을 가리지 않고 영지를 발전시켜
20년 후에 닥칠 제론 황제의 침공에 대비하고,
빼앗긴 황제의 자리를 되찾기로 결심한다!
​
"제론 황제! 후회하게 해주마!"

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rt_xS0sCU4U)
description.pt-br:
O filho do grande imperador Gline, Príncipe “Aaron”, é o recipiente da “Bênção do Dragão”. Mas por causa da rebelião liderada por seu tio, “Zerone”, ele foi banido para os arredores do reino, ‘Campos Brahn’.“O Imperador Zerone vai matar todos nós…”

Mantendo o desejo de seu pai de esquecer a coroa e a vingança, Aaron estava vivendo impotente como o duque de uma terra morta… mas um dia, o Imperador Zerone invadiu os Campos Brahn!Seu objetivo era destruir os Campos Brahn!

Até mesmo o súdito leal, “Gayle”, virou cinzas enquanto observava Duque Aaron e os Campos Brahn desaparecerem no meio das chamas do Imperador Zerone.Pelo menos foi o que achamos que aconteceu!Quando abriu os olhos, Gayle se viu na posição de um jovem príncipe Aaron!

“Eu não vou viver enquanto escondo meu poder como o Duque fez!”Usando todos os meios necessários para desenvolver a terra e se preparando para a invasão do Imperador Zerone que acontecerá daqui a 20 anos, ele decide retomar o lugar do Imperador que foi roubado!

altTitles.ja: ラブファントム

description.en: Momoko is just a mediocre who work at a café, but suddenly the fateful romance appears right in front of her…

altTitles.ja: 税金で買った本

description.en:
Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496607127115)
description.ja: 小学生ぶりに図書館に訪れたヤンキーな石平くん。その図書館で働く早瀬丸さんと白井くんに１０年前借りた本を返却していないことを指摘される。その指摘をきっかけに図書館に通うようになるどころか働くことになる石平くんの図書館お仕事漫画。
description.pt-br: Ishidaira é um delinquente que visitou a biblioteca pela primeira vez desde o ensino fundamental. Mas então, ele foi apontado por Hayasemaru e Shirai, que trabalha na biblioteca, que ele não devolveu um livro que pegou emprestado dez anos atrás. Um mangá sobre como Ishidaira passou de tentar pegar um livro emprestado de uma biblioteca para trabalhar lá.

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 無敵の人

description.en: It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!

title.en: The Villainess Becomes the Leading Lady

altTitles.en: Even Though I'm the Villainess, I'll Become the Heroine!

altTitles.zh: 虽然是恶女，但我会成为女主的

altTitles.es: ¡Aunque sea la villana, me convertire en la heroina!

altTitles.id: Aku Seorang Antagonis, Tapi Aku Akan Jadi Tokoh Utamanya!

altTitles.th: นางร้ายอย่างฉันนี่แหละ จะเป็นนางเอกให้ดู

altTitles.pt-br: A Vilã Se Torna A Protagonista

description.de:
Minjoo wird als Schurkin Dahlia Margaret in einem Fantasyroman wiedergeboren und ist niedergeschmettert von der Tatsache, dass ihr ein früher Tod bevorsteht. Aber wenigstens ist sie Sooyeon, der Tyrannin ihrer Highschool entkommen. Oder? Als Dahlia auf Flore trifft, ihre jüngere Schwester und Gegenspielerin im Buch, wird ihr klar, dass es sich dabei um niemand Geringeren handelt als ihre ehemalige Peinigerin. Getrieben von dem Wunsch zu überleben und am besten gleich Rache zu nehmen, ist Dahlia nun auf der Suche nach mächtigen Verbündeten. Ein gut aussehender Adeliger scheint ein geeigneter Kandidat zu sein. Aber wird ein Deal mit dem mysteriösen Mann Dahlia wirklich helfen, ihre Ziele zu erreichen? Oder erwarten sie unangenehme Überraschungen?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57073756)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-villainess-becomes-the-leading-lady)

description.en:
Reborn into a fantasy novel as a wicked character fated to meet an early demise, Minjoo - now Dahlia Margaret - has a lot on her plate right from the start. But at least she’s now free of her vicious high school bully, Sooyeon. Or is she? When Dahlia meets Flore, her estranged sister and the protagonist of the novel, she is shocked to find that the girl bears a suspicious resemblance to the classmate who tormented her. Now, driven by the desire to save her own life and also get revenge, Dahlia needs to make a powerful ally, and she has her eye on a handsome royal who just might be perfect for the job. However, a deal with this mysterious man might mean more than she bargained for…

---
I wasn't able to overcome the harassment and took my life, but I was reincarnated with the perpetrator? The perpetrator is the heroine, Florre, and I am the villainess, Dahlia, who's going to die horribly.

"They said you are a villain with neither blood nor tears, but unlike the rumors, you often shed tears."

"Your Highness must believe all the nonsense the idiots are talking about, huh?"

Grand Duke of Cervian, the half brother of the male lead and who will be punished for treason afterwards. He approached me. I can't lose the man who will be my greatest ally.

"Your Highness, would you marry me?"

"Now… what did you say?"

"And take revenge together."

A similar situation, a fixed ending. The heroine is not the only one who knows the ending of the novel. I took a long and arduous path of revenge.

---

description.es:
Minjoo sufría el bullying constante de Sooyeon, pero todo cambia cuando las estudiantes que se odiaban a muerte terminan reencarnando en una novela: Sooyeon aparece en el cuerpo de Flore, la heroína, y Minjoo reencarna en el personaje de Dalia, la villana. Minjoo quiere vengarse de su acosadora, pero para eso debe elaborar un plan y aliarse con el archiduque Yohan. La venganza es un plato que se sirve frío…

description.fr:
Minjoo ne s'attendait pas à terminer dans le corps de Dahlia Margaret, un personnage de roman qu'elle connaît bien. Un destin plutôt agréable et qui rattrape celui de sa vie passée, dans laquelle elle subissait solitude et harcèlement. Ou du moins c'est ce qu'elle pensait, jusqu'à ce que Flore, sa sœur fictive fasse son apparition et que Minjoo se rende compte qu'elle ressemble très étrangement à la camarade de classe qui la persécutait. Afin de garder une vie agréable, mais également de se venger, elle a donc besoin d'un allié puissant, et quoi de mieux que le séduisant Grand duc, Johan, pour remplir ce rôle? Seulement, il se pourrait bien que cette alliance avec ce mystérieux jeune homme lui réserve bien des surprises...

description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi ke dalam sebuah novel yang kubaca bersama si penganiaya yang telah menjerumuskanku ke neraka. Si penganiaya itu menjadi 'Florre' yang merupakan tokoh utama dalam novel, sedangkan aku menjadi antagonis yang akan mati secara mengenaskan bernama 'Dahlia'.

Aku, Dahlia yang merupakan antagonis berencana untuk membalaskan dendamku pada Florre sang tokoh utama yang telah dimasuki oleh si penganiaya diriku di dunia sebelumnya, yaitu Lee Suyeon. Aku menyiapkan rencana dan menjalankan semuanya demi itu.

"Yang Mulia Grand Duke, maukah anda menikah dengan saya?"
"Apa... yang baru saja anda katakan?"
"Lalu, mari kita balaskan dendam kita bersama."

Yohan Descartes Servien, kakak tiri dari tokoh pria utama, Noel yang ditakdirkan untuk dihukum setelah melakukan pengkhianatan.
Aku tidak boleh melewatkan pria yang akan menjadi sekutu terbaikku ini.

Karena aku sudah bereinkarnasi ke dalam tubuh ini, aku akan memanfaatkannya dengan baik.
Lee Suyeon, rasakanlah juga rasanya terjerumus ke dalam neraka.

내게 지옥을 선사한 가해자와 함께 읽었던 소설에 빙의해버렸다. 가해자는 여주인공인 '플로레'로, 나는 끔찍하게 죽게 될 악녀 '달리아'로. "대공 전하, 저와 결혼하시지 않으시겠어요?" "지금… 뭐라고 하셨습니까?" "그리고 함께 복수해요." 남주인공인 노엘의 이복 형이자 이후 반역을 일으켜 처단될, 운명인 요한 데카르트 세르비엔. 내 복수의 최고의 아군이 될 남자를 놓쳐서는 안 된다. 악녀의 몸에 빙의한 이상, 이 몸을 철저하게 사용해주겠어. 이수연, 너도 지옥 속으로 빠져봐.

description.pt-br: Renascida em um romance de fantasia como uma personagem perversa fadada a encontrar uma morte precoce, Minjoo - agora Dahlia Margaret - tem muito o que fazer desde o início. Mas pelo menos ela agora está livre de sua cruel valentona do ensino médio, Sooyeon. Ou não? Quando Dahlia conhece Flore, sua irmã afastada e protagonista do romance, ela fica chocada ao descobrir que a garota tem uma semelhança suspeita com a colega de classe que a atormentou. Agora, movida pelo desejo de salvar sua própria vida e também se vingar, Dahlia precisa fazer um aliado poderoso, e ela está de olho em um belo membro da realeza que pode ser perfeito para o trabalho. No entanto, um acordo com esse homem misterioso pode significar mais do que ela esperava.
description.zh-hk:
因無法忍受霸凌而自殺後，竟然和加害者一起進入了小說！加害者變成女主角佩洛蕾，而我變成最後會悲慘死去的惡女妲莉雅。我拉攏了男主角同父異母的哥哥，也就是將在日後發起叛變的約翰·塞爾維安大公，他會是我最可靠的援軍。相似的處境、既定的結局，知道小說結局的人可不只有女主角，我選擇了漫長又辛苦的復仇之路。

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

title.en: Hero x Demon King x Villain

altTitles.es-la: Héroes y Reyes, Demonios y Villanos

description.en:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
description.ko:
신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.
악의 조직을 전전하는 숙련된 삼류 ‘악당’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와
내 편안한 은퇴 생활을 망치고 있다!

악당을 가호하는 아흔아홉 악마시여….
신의 축복이나 받고 뒈지소서!

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: カケル

description.en: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.
description.ja: 「走り過ぎるとオレの”目”はもう一つの世界を映し出す！」　高校生、台場駆は生まれつき、視覚、触覚、味覚、嗅覚、聴覚が異常に鋭くなる能力を持っていた。ガールフレンドの夏目葵が突然消えた事件で、初めてその力を使うことになるのだが果たして？バカンスのつもりで訪れた島で、連続殺人事件に巻き込まれてしまうものの…

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

altTitles.ja: 天使とアクト！！

description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!
description.ja: 政治家を父に持ち、スポーツ万能、成績優秀、非の打ち所のない孤高の天才、凰生為人。が、そんな彼にも欠点が！

altTitles.ja: エボニー

description.en:
“Be quiet. Shut up and live like the dead.”  
  
Ebony Vonieck is a convicted felon for the murder of her fiancé and father. While waiting for her execution in prison, she is suddenly released from her hell when she is informed that the progressive Archduke of Schneider Castle is waiting for her. Broken by her imprisonment, resigned to the charges against her, and expecting her life to become a living hell, what awaits her instead is a household of warm employees and servants. Ebony has no idea that the Archduke will help change her life, and make use of her drive to change the chauvinistic social system of the Kingdom of Kalcass that condemned her to die for a crime she didn't commit.  


---
description.es:
"Cállese. No hable y viva como los muertos."  
  
Ebony Vonieck es una criminal convicta por los asesinatos de su prometido y de su padre. Esperando su ejecución en prisión, es liberada repentinamente de este infierno cuando le es informado que el progresista Archiduque del Castillo Schneider le espera. Destruida por su hacinamiento, resignada a los cargos en su contra y con la expectativa de que su vida se vuelva un infierno, lo que le aguarda es un hogar lleno de empleados y sirvientes cálidos. Ebony no tiene idea de que el Archiduque le ayudará a cambiar su vida, haciendo uso de su ímpetu para cambiar el sistema social chauvinista del Reino de Kalcass que la condenó a morir por un crimen que no cometió.  
  


---
description.ru:
"Будь тихoней. Замoлчи. Живи так, слoвнo тебя не существует". Главная герoиня - Эбoни Вoник, осужденная за убийство своего жениха и отца. Ожидая своей казни в тюрьме, она внезапно освобождается из своего ада, когда ей сообщают, что эрцгерцог замка Шнайдер ждет её. Казалoсь бы, её жизнь станет живым адом, oднакo… Вместо этого её ждет домашнее хозяйство с заботливыми слугами? Эбони понятия не имеет, что эрцгерцог поможет изменить её жизнь.  


---

Based on the Original Webnovel by Jaya  
[Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/19742)  
[Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Ebony/3220?tab=episode)

title.en: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete

altTitles.ja: 仕事帰り、独身の美人上司に頼まれて

altTitles.ja-ro: Shigotogaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Joushi ni Tanomarete

altTitles.en: On My Way Home from Work, My Beautiful Single Boss Asked Me to Do Something for Her

description.en:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

"We have nothing to do with anything else... We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby."
description.ja:
「お願い……。私のこと、抱いてほしい」
若手社員の実沢春彦は、会社で『女帝』と恐れられる厳格な上司・桃生結子から、飲み会帰りホテルへと誘われた。戸惑う実沢に、彼女は恥じらいながらお願いする――。

「私と……子作りだけしてくれないかしら？」

誰にも言えない、恋愛なしの男女の関係が始まる。女上司が俺にだけ見せる顔。好きになってはならないルール。
それなのに俺達は徐々に惹かれ合い――。美人上司と部下、禁断と背徳の大人ラブコメ開幕！

altTitles.ja: 路傍のフジイ

description.en:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

altTitles.ja: 凡骨新兵のモンスターライフ

altTitles.en: The Monstrous New Life of the Fallen Empire's Recruit

altTitles.ja: 凡骨新兵のモンスターライフ@COMIC

description.en:
The protagonist is an ordinary soldier from an empire at war who gets used as a guinea pig for genetic engineering experiments, turned into a monster and put into cryosleep.

200 years later he wakes up in a sword and sorcery world. The empire is gone and he has to survive alone in the body of a monster whom everybody wants to kill on sight. Meanwhile he encounters various pretty ladies (and elves) in need of rescue.

[Original JP Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6204gb/)

altTitles.ja: ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ja: 魔術協会の総本山「時計塔」においてロードに叙されているエルメロイII世は、義妹のライネスから依頼を受け「剥離城アドラ」の遺産相続に立ち会うことに。弟子のグレイを伴い訪れた城で、悲愴な事件が始まる。
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
Trapped in a Game That Flopped

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love

恋する（おとめ）の作り方

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Girl

altTitles.th: เมคอัปรักเสกนายให้สวยปิ๊ง

altTitles.ru: Кажется, я сделал своего друга детства девушкой

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.ja: その“初めて”を“何度でも”──。　舞台は、田舎の名門女子中学・私立ロウ梅学園。この学園のセーラー服を着ることが「夢」だった明日小路（あけびこみち）。少女の「夢」の中学セーラー服ライフが始まる♪　広がる、緑豊かな田園風景。ゆっくり流れる青春時間。
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".
